text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Mm-hm, Dad's still the comedian as<n>always. Haha, the
kiddos even wrote<n>comebacks to his dad jokes!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Well, at least it sounds like they liked<n>the souvenir I sent
'em!
choice_data_list: Is that a letter from home?

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Yup. My family even mentions you<n>here. Take a look.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Tamamo Cross hands me a page<n>filled with the handwritten
messages. I<n>spot a few backwards letters in the<n>
mix—clearly the work of her siblings.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Every message is about the same<n>thing—they're all
brimming with pride<n>after seeing Tamamo Cross run on<n>
the tv program "First Day at Tracen!"

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Oguri, Inari and I had a race for this<n>show, ya see. They said
we didn't<n>needa do it, but we all ran like it was<n>the real
deal!
choice_data_list: Right, they used the whole race, didn't they?
Right, they used the whole race, didn't they?

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
They sure did. Dad's real happy with<n>your training after
seein' that. He said<n>you made his little girl into a star!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
"I better see my White Lightning and<n>her trainer roarin'
through the<n>competition!" Got that? Better not<n>disappoint
him!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Hahaha, All right, I'll let 'im know<n>when I reply.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Oh yeah, and I wanna send my<n>siblings some candy too.
Mind comin'<n>with me to the store?

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
That way you can pick out the candy<n>we send. If anythin'll
get ya into their<n>good books, it's sweets.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
I've heard good things 'bout these<n>chocolates. Ah, check it
out. They've<n>got a peach flavor for a limited time<n>too.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Oh, look at the size of this box of<n>cookies! The tikes'll love
this! And the<n>box looks so fancy!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Now that I'm lookin' 'round... There<n>sure are a lotta
choices. You ever had<n>any of these, Trainer? Any<n>
standouts?
choice_data_list: The fancy box of cookies is really good!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Her siblings no doubt have healthy<n>appetites, so sending
them something<n>they can eat a lot of sounds like a<n>good
idea.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
All right, then I'll grab these cookies<n>and some rice crackers
too.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Hmm... Maybe I'll grab the<n>chocolates as well. If I budget
my<n>money this month, I can buy the<n>regular and
peach-flavored ones.
choice_data_list:
You shouldn't need to cut your own expenses
for it...

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
It's not like I'm starving myself or<n>anythin'. 'Sides, I'm
used to livin' on<n>a budget.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
At that moment, I remember one of<n>the many messages her
family<n>scrawled on their letter to her.

text_block_list.name: Letter
text_block_list.text:
"Thank you for the tasty candy, Tama.<n>Didja get a chance
to try 'em<n>yourself? Don't overdo it. You know<n>we'd be
happy with just a phone<n>call."

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Tamamo Cross's family explicitly told<n>her to not overdo it.
They know she<n>can't be leaving much pocket money<n>for
herself.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Okay, that should do it! I'll get all four!
choice_data_list: You're not going to buy something for yourself?
You're not going to buy something for yourself?

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Why would I? Have ya seen<n>Tracen's cafeteria? I'm eatin'
like a<n>queen every day!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Livin' any fancier than that would feel<n>like a crime!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Anyway, I'd rather see my family<n>eatin' somethin' tasty
than eat it<n>myself.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
After that, I got to thinkin' up ways I<n>could make my
family's dreams come<n>true. And eventually I landed on the<n>
Twinkle Series.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
My folks worked hard to get me into<n>this academy, so I
gotta make it worth<n>the price! That's why I gotta win!<n>
But...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It's clear to me that she feels<n>indebted to her family for
sending her<n>to Tracen Academy. That's probably<n>why
she's putting them first here.
choice_data_list: Okay, just don't overdo it on the budgeting.
Okay, just don't overdo it on the budgeting.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
You questionin' my skills?! I'll have<n>ya know I'm a pro
when it comes to<n>livin' on da cheap! And what are ya,<n>my
mom?!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: A'ight, chill! Geez, maybe ya really<n>are my mom!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Tamamo Cross is clearly dedicated to<n>her family, and it
shows in her races.<n>But I can't help but feel that she<n>
could stand to indulge herself every<n>once in a while.
